name: Last Legend
description:
Story:
To the west in the forest, the Low Prophet of the Crimson Papacy themself guides the largest gathering of believers on the final pilgrimage. To the east in the swamp, lives mother Elgrid, the last of the witches. She watches as Ozlogath, the Herald of Slimes gathers his forces. To the south in the desert, the Last Legion has successfully captured an Old God, but they are under attack from believers who will do anything to free it.

Controls:
WASD to Move, Left Click to switch weapon, F to Talk, Right Click to Attack. 1234 Weapon Switch
or
Arrows to Move , F to Talk, Space to Attack. ZXCV Weapon Switch

Credits:
Character Art: A. Hill
Enviroment Art and Sound: H. Fortun
Programming and Writing: M. Vera

Special Thanks:
https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template
